#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int tab[]={1 ,7,31, 111, 351, 1023, 2815, 7423, 18943, 47103, 114687, 274431, 647167, 1507327, 3473407, 7929855, 1179647, 6815743, 6291455,7340031, 6291455, 8388607};
int main()
{
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%d",&n);
              if(n<=22)
              printf("%d\n",tab[n-1]);
              else
              printf("%d\n",tab[21]);
}
  //  system("pause");
    return 0;
}
